name: ods-charts
description: ODS Charts is based on Apache ECharts and provides Orange charts components.
author: Orange SA

scripts.install-all-deep: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./test/angular-echarts/node_modules && rm -rf ./test/angular-ng-boosted/node_modules && rm -rf ./test/angular-ngx-echarts/node_modules && rm -rf ./test/react/node_modules && rm -rf ./test/vue/node_modules && npm i && cd test/angular-echarts && npm i && cd ../angular-ng-boosted && npm i && cd ../angular-ngx-echarts && npm i && cd ../react && npm i && cd ../vue && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.install-all: npm i && cd test/angular-echarts && npm i && cd ../angular-ng-boosted && npm i && cd ../angular-ngx-echarts && npm i && cd ../react && npm i && cd ../vue && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.netlify: npm run build && cp -R dist docs/ && npm run typedoc
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --out docs/api src/ods-charts.ts --disableSources --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --readme docs/README.md && node build/add_head.mjs
scripts.test:angular-ngx-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ngx-echarts && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-ngx-echarts
scripts.test:angular-ng-boosted: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-ng-boosted && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-ng-boosted
scripts.test:angular-echarts: npm i && npm run build && cd test/angular-echarts && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:angular-echarts
scripts.test:react: npm i && npm run build && cd test/react && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:react
scripts.test:vue: npm i && npm run build && cd test/vue && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i && npm run build && cd ../.. && npm run serve:vue
